There's no such thing as visual learner or any other kind of learner ([e.g. Rogowsky, Calhoun & Tallal, 2015](https://www.apa.org/pubs/journals/features/edu-a0037478.pdf){target="_blank"}). With that said, reinforcement using different mediums such as presentations, videos, visualizations, walkthroughs, and so forth can help and will be provided in this part of the site.
